page.lettertext:
fol.252r
[T]
o my L. Trea
s
May it please yo
r
good L. of my publicke dealing w
th
e
states,
and w
t
e
Councel of Estate
, to obtene their
Licence for
e troupes, w
ch
her
M
tie
hath re
q
red, I have
written in my former as much as seemed needfull.
W
ch
tended all to this effect,
at there is nothing in
at
behalf to be gotte w
t
their good willes: and they thincke
I doe them wronge, to presse them more
p
cisly then the
l
re
of her M
tie
. But I have spoken since in privat, w
t
some of
e chiefest, and debated upon the reasons, w
ch
I
had publikly proposed to have moved her M
tie
to t
k
ake
e
benefit of her forces
at serve in theese c
o
treis, to witte,
The great good assurance, wherto these
Provinces
are reduced,
e necessitie of the
Kinge
for
e recoverie of
Britaine;
the
evid
e
t danger
at may growe both to her and to them, if
e enemey should possesse it; her desire to be served of
ex
im
e
ted souldiors, and to be eased in some part of
e burden
of her charges: for w
ch
respectes they might imagine,
at
she will not be refused, howsoever they shall pleade upon
e adv
a
tage of her writing: and therefor wished them therein,
to yelde nowe at
e first, and
at w
t
shewe of som good liking,
for
at they sawe
at at lenght they must yelde of necessitie.
Though I have done my best endevo
r
w
t
these and other
allegations, to induce them to my purpose, yet howe well
they are
suaded I can not yet deliver w
t
any certaintie
unto yow: but to signify my c
o
jecture upon their answeares
in conference,
a
d upon the opinions of divers others, I thincke
if her Hig
nes
will make an absolut demaunde, though
haps
they doe not give an absolut allowance, they will be well enough
cont
e
t, to use no further opposition. Wherein I thought somw
at
re
q
sit to advertise my
suasion, to
e end I may
e sooner
be strengthned from her M
tie
wth a cleerer l
re
then
e former.
In
e meane while I thincke there is gotten a very great
point, in procuring
e companies to be distributed into
garrisons.
And so I take my h
u
ble leave
July 19 1592
